about_the_game:
Yua's Yuri Office is a Visual Novel in which you play as Yua, just returning to the office after things have been shut down for an extended period. Yua is determined to take full advantage of this fresh start to improve her life.

Though it's time to return to the office, most of Yua's coworkers have opted for remote work instead, leaving Yua at a loss for how to rebuild a social life. Still, she will just have to make her options work for her. Will Yua pursue romance, friendship, or will she prioritize her work life to the point of sacrificing the social circle she initially set out to create?

Features:
2 different story routes, with 4 endings each.
Player choices determining how the story progresses and what ending you get.
Both routes are yuri options.
Playtime per playthrough is approximately 2-4 hours depending on individual reading speed.

The Main Characters

Yua:
(23F) The protagonist of the story, she is having difficulty trying to readjust to normalcy after returning to the office. She's somewhat passive in her approach to situations, but with some luck and help from the player she may learn to build up a more active role in her own life. She wants to someday become a fantasy writer, but for now she's stuck behind an office desk.

Aiko:
(22F) She was still learning her day to day tasks at the office whenever the lockdowns happened, so despite technically having been an employee for the company for several years, she's still very much new to everything. She also had a lot of trouble making any friends at the office before lockdowns because she was very shy, awkward, and generally seen as weird. Much to Yua's surprise, upon returning to the office Aiko seems to have gotten significantly more confident and bold during lockdowns. She hopes to someday open her own collectibles shop, and enjoys gaming and TTRPGs.


Nozomi:
(23F) Started working at the office around the same time Yua did, though they never really hit it off before. She tends to be very reclusive and shy and always just stuck to keeping her social circle limited to just 1 very close friend. Now after lockdowns, her oddities seem to have been magnified for some reason, and while it may just be from the lockdown, Yua can't shake the feeling that something is definitely off about her that wasn't before.

content_descriptors.notes: Sexual content consists solely of occasional jokes/innuendo. Also, on one route in the story the player will be told details of a murderer's crimes, though these are limited strictly to descriptions of the murders and the player is never shown any gore. There is periodic cursing/swearing throughout both routes.

name: Yua's Yuri Office

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL capable GPU
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Yua's Yuri Office is a Visual Novel in which you play as Yua, just returning to the office after things have been shut down for an extended period. Yua is determined to take full advantage of this fresh start to improve her life. Will she pursue friendship, romance, or just focus on her work?
